  physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a Hindu temple. The temple has a gopuram that is embellished with six tiers of sculptures of Hindu deities. Each tier is slightly smaller than that of the tier immediately below. The entrance to the temple is directly below the gopuram. There are some sculptures of Hindu deities that are located to the left of the gopuram as well. There are some trees in the background on the right hand side of the phootgraph.

  subject_terms_1: temples (buildings) Hinduism
